entry.string: The Modules Module controls the modules that you have installed on your Xaraya System. It basically controls the install, upgrades, and removal of modules.
entry.translation: Zee Mudooles Mudoole-a cuntruls zee mudooles thet yuoo hefe-a instelled oon yuoor Xereya System. It beseecelly cuntruls zee instell, upgredes, und remufel ooff mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have two choices. "View", and "Configure Hooks".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a tvu chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork! "Feeoo", und "Cunffeegoore-a Huuks".

entry.string: View -- Allows you to see what modules are currently installed on your system, and the current state that they are in.
entry.translation: Feeoo -- Elloos yuoo tu see-a vhet mudooles ere-a coorrently instelled oon yuoor system, und zee coorrent stete-a thet zeey ere-a in. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Configure Hooks -- Allows you to set certain hooks for modules to be reused (such as allowing comments on a module's data)
entry.translation: Cunffeegoore-a Huuks -- Elloos yuoo tu set certeeen huuks fur mudooles tu be-a reoosed (sooch es ellooeeng cumments oon a mudoole's deta)

entry.string: The Modules Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Mudooles Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The Modules Module has no hooks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Mudooles Mudoole-a hes nu huuks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
